Persona 5

Quick Facts

  • Release Date: April 4, 2017
  • Developer: Atlus
  • Publisher: Atlus
  • Platforms: PS3, PS4, PS5
  • Genre: JRPG
  • Price: £49.99

Game Description

*Persona 5* is a JRPG that follows a group of high school students who become the Phantom Thieves of Hearts. They explore the Metaverse to change the hearts of corrupt individuals and reform society.

Key Features

  • Turn-based combat with strategic depth
  • Engaging social simulation elements
  • Stylish visuals and unique art style
  • Rich story with memorable characters
  • Dynamic soundtrack
  • Extensive replayability

Game Systems

Combat

Utilize Personas and team tactics in turn-based battles.

Social Links

Build relationships with characters to unlock new abilities.

Exploration

Explore Tokyo and the Metaverse to uncover secrets and treasures.

Ready to Steal Hearts?

Join the Phantom Thieves and change the world!
